lexi_down.message: Sorry, Lexi is currently not working. Please try later.

lexi_no_user.message: Please log in or register to use Lexi.

lexi_login_education.message: What is your highest obtained education?

lexi_login_error_710.message: This email address is not registered.

lexi_login_error_712.message: This email address is already registered.

lexi_simplifications_loaded.message: Click on marked words to simplify them.

lexi_simplifications_loading_longtext.message: Loading simplifications - may take some time...

lexi_simplifications_error.message: Oops, something went wrong. Lexi could not simplify this page.

lexi_feedback_reminder.message: Please give Lexi feedback when you're done reading.

lexi_feedback_solicit.message: Did Lexi do a good job?

lexi_unknown_server_error.message: Unknown Error Occurred. Server response not received.

lexi_no_email_error.message: Login Error. Please provide an email address.

lexi_login_why_data.message: Why does Lexi need to know this?

lexi_login_why_data_explanation.message: Lexi improves over time. It learns which words are difficult for which users. For this, it places users into groups according to age and education.

lexi_login_terms_agree.message: I agree to Lexi's handling of my data.
